title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - July 8, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - July 8, 2021
description:
Mark & Gary reconnect and discuss some developments in Harvey Weinstein's Los Angeles case, some fines being levied against the LA County courthouses and Mark introduces us to attorney John Cole and what role he is playing in a prominent case in the news this week.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
